data.name: ActiveXControlUnableToInstall
data.value: The ActiveX Control is unable to be installed.

data.name: ActiveXControlUnableToUninstall
data.value: The ActiveX Control is unable to be uninstalled.

data.name: AddressNotUnderstood
data.value: The address "{0}" wasn't understood. Please report this bug.

data.name: AnotherInstancePreventingTemplate
data.value: The Template could not be activated. Another instance of Flashpoint Secure Player is preventing the Template from being activated.

data.name: AsAdministratorUser
data.value: as an Administrator User

data.name: ConfigurationUnableToLoad
data.value: The configuration is unable to be loaded. Please ensure Flashpoint is not corrupted, was extracted correctly, and is not running from OneDrive or a network drive.

data.name: CurationMissingTemplateName
data.value: This curation is missing a template name.

data.name: EnvironmentVariablesProblem
data.value: The Environment Variables encountered a problem.

data.name: EnvironmentVariablesTimeout
data.value: The Environment Variables timed out.

data.name: FlashpointProxyNotEnabled
data.value: The Flashpoint Proxy could not be enabled.

data.name: FlashpointSecurePlayer
data.value: Flashpoint Secure Player

data.name: ForceDeleteAllWarning
data.value: This will force the deletion of the modification from your system. You should not do this unless instructed to by Flashpoint staff. Continue?

data.name: GameDownloading
data.value: The game is downloading.

data.name: GameIsMissingFiles
data.value: The game files "{0}" are missing. Please ensure Flashpoint is not corrupted, was extracted correctly, and is not running from OneDrive or a network drive.

data.name: GameNotActiveXControl
data.value: This game is not a valid ActiveX Control.

data.name: GameNotCuratedCorrectly
data.value: This game was not curated correctly. Please report this bug.

data.name: GameUnableToLaunch
data.value: This game is unable to launch {0}.

data.name: IgnoreActiveXControlInstallFailureWarning
data.value: The ActiveX Control Install Status will be ignored. The ActiveX Import may not work as intended.

data.name: JobObjectNotCreated
data.value: The Job Object could not be created. Is your Windows Version new enough? Flashpoint only supports Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, and Windows 10.

data.name: LaunchGame
data.value: This game will not work unless it is run {0}. Do you want to launch it {0}? If you choose No, the application will exit.

data.name: ModificationsUnableToLoadImport
data.value: The Modifications were unable to load because an Import was in progress.

data.name: NoGameSelected
data.value: No game was selected to start, so the application is exiting.

data.name: NoModeSelected
data.value: No mode was selected.

data.name: OCS_CPUSpeedNotDetermined
data.value: The CPU's clock speed could not be determined.

data.name: OCS_NoMultipleInstances
data.value: You cannot run multiple instances of Old CPU Simulator.

data.name: OCS_OldCPUNotSimulated
data.value: The old CPU could not be simulated.

data.name: OldCPUSimulator
data.value: Old CPU Simulator

data.name: OldCPUSimulatorProblem
data.value: The Old CPU Simulator encountered a problem. The Target Rate may be invalid.

data.name: OldCPUSimulatorSlow
data.value: With Old CPU Simulator, the game may load slowly. Please wait for the game to load.

data.name: OpenFlashpointLauncher
data.value: Open the Flashpoint Launcher via the Start Flashpoint shortcut in the Flashpoint folder.

data.name: ProcessCompatibilityConflict
data.value: The process "{0}" causes a compatibility conflict with this game. Please close it to continue.

data.name: ProcessUnableToStart
data.value: The process is unable to start.

data.name: RegistryStateAlreadyInProgress
data.value: The Registry State could not be started because another one has already been started.

data.name: RegistryStateInProgress
data.value: The Registry State is being created. Please do not turn off your computer.

data.name: RegistryStateNotInProgress
data.value: The Registry State could not be stopped because no Registry State has been started.

data.name: RegistryStateTimeout
data.value: The Registry State timed out.

data.name: RegistryStateUnableToCreate
data.value: The Registry State is unable to be created.

data.name: RegistryStateWasSuccessful
data.value: The Registry State was successfully created.

data.name: RequiredComponentsAreLoading
data.value: The required components are loading. Please do not turn off your computer.

data.name: RequiredComponentsAreUnloading
data.value: The required components are unloading. Please do not turn off your computer.

data.name: UnableToCreateCustomSecurityManager
data.value: Unable to create a Custom Security Manager.

data.name: UnableToGetParentProcessExecutableFileName
data.value: Unable to get the Parent Process Executable File Name.

data.name: UnableToSetWorkingDirectory
data.value: Unable to set the Working Directory.

data.name: UnknownProcessCompatibilityConflict
data.value: An unknown process is causing a compatibility conflict with this game. The application cannot continue.

data.name: UseFlashActiveXControlWarning
data.value: This curation uses the Flash ActiveX Control. It may not work as intended in future Windows updates.

data.name: UseFlashpointLauncher
data.value: Please use the Flashpoint Launcher to select a game to start.

data.name: WindowsVersionTooOld
data.value: Your Windows Version is too old for Flashpoint Secure Player. Flashpoint supports Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, and Windows 10.

data.name: WithCompatibilitySettings
data.value: with Compatibility Settings

data.name: WithOldCPUSimulator
data.value: with Old CPU Simulator
